text: the second service is called Amazon poly
which is a text to speech deep learning
[Applause]
service so ply allows you to take a
stream of text and submit it to the
service this could be a stream like the
temperature in wa is 75°
F and poly will then spin out an mp3
stream that will repeat what you
actually put in the text stream now
there's
intelligence inside of poly such that
when it comes out in audio it doesn't
come out the way I said it it's very
awkward to say things like w you know W
or F it'll instead come out as the
temperature in Washington is
75° Fahrenheit the service again you
submit a text stream you get back an MP3
audio stream it allows you to Cache the
responses so you can use them
repeatedly the response times are very
fast it comes with 47 different voices
fully managed service for you and again
very cost effective
